channel.title: How do i change drop rates -PLEASEHELP?
channel.description:
how do i change the drop rates?
please help
npcdrop = 2027 4724 1 1 npcdrop = 2027 4726 1 1 npcdrop = 2027 4728 1 1 npcdrop = 2027 4730 1 1 npcdrop = 2027 526 1 100
i know the 2027 is npc id and the next one item id but idk where the other 2 serve for:)

item.title: How do i change drop rates -PLEASEHELP?
item.dc:creator: @prideofpk prideofpk
item.source: How do i change drop rates -PLEASEHELP?

item.title: How do i change drop rates -PLEASEHELP?
item.dc:creator: @Ziege_Terra_117 Ziege Terra 117
item.description:
@Ziege_Terra_117 wrote:

Okay, this is pretty much itâ€¦

npcdrop = 2027     4724     1     100

Okay, as you know, the 2027 is the npc id and the 4724 is the item id.

The 1 would be the amount of the item, and the 100 would be the drop rate in percentages.

So if i wanted to make a man drop 1000gp 100% of the time i would write:

npcdrop = 1     995     1000     100

Hope I helped ^^

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change drop rates -PLEASEHELP?
